text: Kare-ra wa, arra o oite rippogakusha ya shudo-shi o jibun no omo to nashi, mata maruyamu no ko masu~ifu o (omo to shite iru). Shikashi kare-ra wa, yuiitsunaru kaminitsukaeru igai no meirei o ukete wa inai. Kare no soto ni kami wa nai nodearu. Kare-ra ga haisuru mono kara hanarete (takaku imasu) kare o tataeru
